name: ManualValidation
description: [PREVIEW] Pause a pipeline run to wait for manual interaction. Works only with YAML pipelines.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: notifyUsers
inputs.label: Notify users
inputs.helpMarkDown: Send a manual validation pending email to specific users (or groups). Only users specified in approvers can act on a manual validation.

inputs.name: approvers
inputs.label: Approvers
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify users/groups/project teams separated by commas to act on a manual validation. In absence of input, users with queue build permission will be able to take action.

inputs.name: instructions
inputs.label: Instructions
inputs.helpMarkDown: These instructions will be shown to the user for resuming or rejecting the manual validation. Based on these instructions the user will take an informed decision about this manual validation.

inputs.name: onTimeout
inputs.label: On timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: Reject or resume this manual validation automatically after it is pending for the specified timeout or 30 days, whichever is earlier.
